full_summary:
### [Notice of RFP](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15750715)

### Tender Description:
The Government of Canada's Department of National Defence, through the Canadian Forces School of Military Engineering, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Training Aids for Petroleum Oil and Lubrication Storage Tanks.

### Tender Specifications:
* **Request Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Tender Method:** Open Bidding
* **Contract Type:** Goods
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Vendor Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Closing Date and Time:** 20 April, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

### Delivery Locations:
* **Oromocto**, New Brunswick

### Relevant Documents:
The RFP and all related documents are available on the above [Notice of RFP](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15750715) link.

### Contact Information:
* **Point of Contact:** Lyne Leger (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email Address:** [lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** Not Applicable
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

Please feel free to ask if anything is unclear or if you have other questions to consider.
The above rewritten entry uses a cleaner syntax. Please let me know if I need to make any changes.  There is no penalty assessed as yet for the assistance offered, however I will appreciate any awards for quality work! Created by Ankit3.0 `
